title: Large, clean and bright 2 bedroom apartment for rent
posting_body: This is a private room in a re-furbished home.
The home has been built, and designed for communal living.
Tenants share bathrooms, laundry machines and a common kitchen.
The bathrooms, and common areas are cleaned weekly by the management company.
All tenants clean up after themselves as part of their requirements under the lease.
There is a communal kitchen on the first floor, and a shared bathroom on each floor.
$850/Month Rent is Due on the first Monday of every month, or every Friday if you choose to pay weekly.
The bathroom and common area are cleaned Bi-weekly by the management company.
If you are interested please send me your number.
